member.name: T:msdo.oauth.client.Controllers.ClientCredentialGrantController
member.summary: Client credential controller. This controller provides the endpoint used for invoking request for protected resource, where the client credential authorization grant is used to obtain access token @author: Martin Edwin Schj√∏dt Nielsen

member.name: M:msdo.oauth.client.Controllers.ClientCredentialGrantController.UseClientCredentialGrantToAccessProtectedResource
member.summary: Provides a protected resource if a valid token is provided
